wikipedia_page.main: Nadine Hoskinson (d. 30 May 2010), well known as Elizabeth Oldfield was a popular British writer of over 40 romance novels in Mills & Boon from 1982 to 1998, when she retired from romance. In her sixties, she decided to return to writing, and was published again in 2007.
